Name: Blockers
Jql: (Project=CMS OR Project=Prod OR Project="Rank Production") AND (priority = Blocker OR issuetype = Incident) AND statuscategory != done

Name: Web Bugs
Jql: project = "Rank Production" AND type != Epic AND type != Sub-Task AND status in ("To Do", Started, "In Progress", "Open Pull Request", "Merged into Develop", Backlog)
